snippet: The Navy’s oldest warship will sail under its own power for just the second time in more than a century to commemorate the battle that won it the nickname Old Ironsides.
abstract: USS Constitution, the Navy's oldest warship, will sail under its own power for just the second time in more than a century to commemorate a battle in the War of 1812.
lead_paragraph: The Navy’s oldest warship will sail under its own power for just the second time in more than a century to commemorate the battle that won it the nickname Old Ironsides.

headline.main: Massachusetts: A Short Outing for ‘Old Ironsides’ on Sunday
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: A Short Outing For ‘Old Ironsides’ On Sunday
